coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.auth

Class AuthenticationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.BaseController
      • coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.auth.AuthenticationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Defaults

    @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/service-auth")
public class AuthenticationController
extends BaseController
    The controller for authentication. This handle logins (to sakai) and registrations. This class handle RestFull service calls using JSON.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.1
    Author:
    OpenCollab

    • Method Detail

      • loginGet

        @RequestMapping(value="/login/{username}/{password:.+}",
                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public Login loginGet(@PathVariable
                                         String username,
                                         @PathVariable
                                         String password)
        Deprecated. This method must not be used and will be removed
        Login the given user to sakai. Please is loginPost, better since the password is not passed in the url.
        Parameters:
        username - The username
        password - The password
        Returns:
        The Login object given a status and a sessionId of successful.

      • loginPost

        @RequestMapping(value="/login/{username}",
                method=POST)
@ResponseBody
public Login loginPost(@RequestBody
                                          String body,
                                          @PathVariable
                                          String username)
        Login the given user. The password is passed in the body under a 'password' value.
        Parameters:
        body - The content of the call
        username - The username
        Returns:
        The Login object given a status and a sessionId of successful.
